data.title: Favorites
data.meta_description: A list of 434 films compiled on Letterboxd, including Donnie Darko (2001), Song to Song (2017), Om Shanti Om (2007), Miami Vice (2006) and Casting Blossoms to the Sky (2012). About this list: This is an ever-growing list of my favorite movies of all time. I wasn't sure of an exact number, so I decided this will just be all the movies I think should be on this list. __________________________________________________________ Multiple Entry Directors: 13 entries: Johnnie To 11 entries: Nobuhiko Obayashi 8 entries: Michael Mann 7 entries: Hou Hsiao-hsien, Terrence Malick, Sion Sono, Tsai Ming-liang 6 entries: Wes Anderson, David Lynch, Andrei Tarkovsky 5 entries: Olivier Assayas, John Carpenter, Francis Ford Coppola, Akira Kurosawa, Sam Raimi, Steven Spielberg, Straub/Huillet, The Wachowski Sisters, Wong Kar-wai, Edward Yang 4 entries: Michael Bay, David Cronenberg, David Fincher, Ryusuke Hamaguchi, Jia Zhangke, Hayao Miyazaki, Jacques Rivette, Jean Rollin, Steven Soderbergh, Bela Tarr 3 entries: Paul Thomas Anderson, Dario Argento, Peter Bogdanovich, James Cameron, Cameron Crowe, Lav Diaz, Kevin Greutert, Richard Kelly, Farah Khan, Kiyoshi Kurosawa, Jerry Lewis, Justin Lin, S. S. Rajamouli, Paul Schrader, Martin Scorsese, M. Night Shyamalan, Gore Verbinski, Wai Ka-fai, Rob Zombie 2 entries: Andrew Adamson, Chantal Akerman, Paul W. S. Anderson, Michaelangelo Antonioni, Wang Bing, Jon Bois, Aditya Chopra, Stephen Chow, The Coen Brothers, Larry Cohen, Pedro Costa, Wes Craven, Atom Egoyan, John Ford, Lucio Fulci, Bi Gan, Alex Garland, Jean-Luc Godard, Peter Greenaway, Kevin Greutert, Amy Heckerling, King Hu, Shunji Iwai, Lam Ngai Kai, Yorgos Lanthimos, Spike Lee, Martin McDonagh, Christopher Nolan, Kenny Ortega, Park Chan-wook, Alain Resnais, Mani Ratnam, Carlos Reygadas, Guy Ritchie, Tony Scott, Koji Shiraishi, Chad Stahelski, Tsui Hark, Paul Verhoeven, John Woo, Andrzej Żuławski __________________________________________________________ By Decade: 2020s - 52 2010s - 91 2000s - 109 1990s - 67 1980s - 61 1970s - 28 1960s - 15 1950s - 5 1940s - 3 1930s - 0 1920s - 3 __________________________________________________________ By Language: English - 218 Chinese - 67 Japanese - 53 French - 29 Hindi - 13 Italian - 12 Korean - 6 Russian - 6 Spanish - 5 Hungarian - 4 Tagalog - 3 Tamil - 3 Telugu - 3 Czech - 2 German - 2 Thai - 2 Armenian - 1 Ganda - 1 Norwegian - 1 Polish - 1 Portuguese - 1 Swedish - 1
data.text:
This is an ever-growing list of my favorite movies of all time. I wasn't sure of an exact number, so I decided this will just be all the movies I think should be on this list.

__________________________________________________________

Multiple Entry Directors:

13 entries:

Johnnie To

11 entries:

Nobuhiko Obayashi

8 entries:

Michael Mann

7 entries:

Hou Hsiao-hsien, Terrence Malick, Sion Sono, Tsai Ming-liang

6 entries:

Wes Anderson, David Lynch, Andrei Tarkovsky

5 entries:

Olivier Assayas, John Carpenter, Francis Ford Coppola, Akira Kurosawa, Sam Raimi, Steven Spielberg, Straub/Huillet, The Wachowski Sisters, Wong Kar-wai, Edward Yang

4 entries:

Michael Bay, David Cronenberg, David Fincher, Ryusuke Hamaguchi, Jia Zhangke, Hayao Miyazaki, Jacques Rivette, Jean Rollin, Steven Soderbergh, Bela Tarr

3 entries:

Paul Thomas Anderson, Dario Argento, Peter Bogdanovich, James Cameron, Cameron Crowe, Lav Diaz, Kevin Greutert, Richard Kelly, Farah Khan, Kiyoshi Kurosawa, Jerry Lewis, Justin Lin, S. S. Rajamouli, Paul Schrader, Martin Scorsese, M. Night Shyamalan, Gore Verbinski, Wai Ka-fai, Rob Zombie

2 entries:

Andrew Adamson, Chantal Akerman, Paul W. S. Anderson, Michaelangelo Antonioni, Wang Bing, Jon Bois, Aditya Chopra, Stephen Chow, The Coen Brothers, Larry Cohen, Pedro Costa, Wes Craven, Atom Egoyan, John Ford, Lucio Fulci, Bi Gan, Alex Garland, Jean-Luc Godard, Peter Greenaway, Kevin Greutert, Amy Heckerling, King Hu, Shunji Iwai, Lam Ngai Kai, Yorgos Lanthimos, Spike Lee, Martin McDonagh, Christopher Nolan, Kenny Ortega, Park Chan-wook, Alain Resnais, Mani Ratnam, Carlos Reygadas, Guy Ritchie, Tony Scott, Koji Shiraishi, Chad Stahelski, Tsui Hark, Paul Verhoeven, John Woo, Andrzej Żuławski

__________________________________________________________

By Decade:

2020s - 52

2010s - 91

2000s - 109

1990s - 67

1980s - 61

1970s - 28

1960s - 15

1950s - 5

1940s - 3

1930s - 0

1920s - 3

__________________________________________________________
